snippet.title: Not For Broadcast — Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Not For Broadcast is NOW AVAILABLE on Steam, GOG and Epic Games Store.
https://www.notforbroadcastgame.com/

Dive into a world of scathing satire and surreal screwball comedy in this one-of-a-kind game of live broadcast news management, complete after two years in Early Access, and accompanied by the game's biggest and most content-packed update yet that includes the third and final episode, several story endings, new achievements, challenges and more. 

The launch update brings Not For Broadcast up to a staggering 42 hours, 57 minutes and 52 seconds of live-action footage to edit, splice and unleash on unsuspecting viewers, officially breaking the record for the Most Full-Motion Video footage in a game, as verified by GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS®!

Follow the developers on social media:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/notgamesuk
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/notgamesuk
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/notgamesuk

Join the community on Discord:
https://discord.gg/notforbroadcast
